```{r}
library(here)
library(tidyverse)
library(knitr)

pipeline_files <- c("00_prep_data/prep_all_sites.qmd",
                    "01_process_data/process_all_sites.qmd",
                    "02_score_data/score_all_sites.qmd")

map(pipeline_files, \(f) {
  purl(here(f), output = "temp.R", quiet = TRUE)
  source("temp.R")  
  unlink("temp.R")
})
```
